text: Ploska () is a rural locality (a village) in Chernovskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 92 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 7.5 km south-west from Chernovskoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Ploska, Perm Krai
